metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3727 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description: DokuWiki 2009-12-25c allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals theinstallation path in an error message, as demonstrated by lib/tpl/index.phpand certain other files.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
